item.title: Previewing the new SSRS 2016 portal
item.description: Ran into an issue with the “Preview New Reporting Portal” link on a fresh install of 2016 giving me a not found error. Changing the virtual directory in the Report URL tab for SSRS configuration fixed this invalid link. In my case, I changed /Report to /Reporting. Thanks to Adam on Stack Overflow for providing the solution and saving me a lot of time!
